Body:
d = dt.datetime(year=2019, month=1, day=1)
gpsr = [gps.GPS(1, 1, d)]
rec = gps.gpsr_to_records(gpsr)
assert isinstance(rec, pd.DataFrame)
assert len(rec) == 1
assert all(c in rec.columns for c in ['lat', 'lon', 'ts'])
rec = rec.iloc[0]
assert rec.lat == 1
assert rec.lon == 1
assert rec.ts == d
